description.en:
event fired after the resizing has been executed and results are rendered
The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridResizing widget.
Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
Use ui.columnIndex to get the resized column index.
Use ui.columnKey to get the resized column key.
Use ui.originalWidth to get the original column width.
Use ui.newWidth to get the final column width after resizing.

Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridResizing widget.
Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.

Use ui.columnKey to get the resized column key.
Use ui.desiredWidth to get the desired width(before min/max coercion) for the resized column.

description.en: Resize the column to the size of the longest currently visible cell value.
description.jp: Resize the column to the size of the longest currently visible cell value.

description.en: A list of column settings that specifies resizing options on a per column basis.
description.jp: A list of column settings that specifies resizing options on a per column basis.

description.en: Specifies the column key of the resized column
description.jp: Specifies the column key of the resized column

description.en: Column index can be used in place of column key. The preferred way of populating a column setting is to always use the column keys as identifiers.
description.jp: Column index can be used in place of column key. The preferred way of populating a column setting is to always use the column keys as identifiers.

description.en: Enables disables resizing for the column.
description.jp: Enables disables resizing for the column.

description.en: Specifies whether the resizing should be deferred until the user finishes resizing or applied immediately.
description.jp: Specifies whether the resizing should be deferred until the user finishes resizing or applied immediately.

description.en: The width in pixels of the resizing handle which is position at the right side of each resizeable column header.
description.jp: The width in pixels of the resizing handle which is position at the right side of each resizeable column header.
